org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager

Class TaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager.TaskManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VersionedProtocol, TaskOperationProtocol

    public class TaskManager
extends Object
implements TaskOperationProtocol
    A task manager receives tasks from the job manager and executes them. After having executed them (or in case of an execution error) it reports the execution result back to the job manager. Task managers are able to automatically discover the job manager and receive its configuration from it as long as the job manager is running on the same local network

      All parameters are obtained from the GlobalConfiguration, which must be loaded prior to instantiating the task manager.

      • logBufferUtilization

        public void logBufferUtilization()

        Specified by:
        logBufferUtilization in interface TaskOperationProtocol

      • killTaskManager

        public void killTaskManager()
                     throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: TaskOperationProtocol
        Kills the task manager. This method is mainly intended to test and debug Nephele's fault tolerance mechanisms.
        Specified by:
        killTaskManager in interface TaskOperationProtocol
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs during this remote procedure call
